main.name: Justin Russell
main.description: I am a Software Engineer, and I play golf
main.bio: I am a Lambda School Full Stack Web Development graduate and Freelance Software Engineer. When I am away from my computer you can find me watching sports or out playing golf. I love anything that has to do with the Lakers and Yankees, and will watch any form of football regardless of who is playing. At night, I like to go out to the movies, watch a comedy show, or enjoy some of the great food that Portland has to offer.
main.contactmessage: Contact me for any and all web development and golf inquiries!
